extendedInfo.description: Flashlight Lite turns your phone screen into source of light you need!Brightest Flashlight now give you chance to find a way in dark room, gloomy weather outside or any situation you can imagine!Touch screen to change settings - pick a colour you like, change brightness of the screen, turn on/off blinking.Keywords: flash, flashlight, screen light, flash light, blinking screen.

reviews.title: Roro69
reviews.comment: Great app. Exactly what i needed. Intuitive and easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User
